NAME: Name
DEFINITION: Single or multi word designation assigned to a data element. Source: ISO 11179.

NAME: Definition
DEFINITION: Statement that expresses the essential nature of a data element and permits its differentiation from all other data elements. Source: ISO 11179.

NAME: Keywords
DEFINITION: One or more significant words used for retrieval of data elements. Source: ISO 11179.

NAME: Minimum size
DEFINITION: The minimum number of storage units to represent the data element value.\r\nSource: ISO 11179.

NAME: Short Description
DEFINITION: Brief text about the content of the dataset.

NAME: Methodology for obtaining data
DEFINITION: Brief descritpion of methodology for obtaining data in dataset.

NAME: Planned updating frequency
DEFINITION: Planned update frequency for the definitions in the dataset.

NAME: Maximum size
DEFINITION: The maximum number of storage units to represent the data element value.\r\nSource: ISO 11179.

NAME: Datatype
DEFINITION: A set of distinct values for representing the data element value. Source: ISO 11179.

NAME: Public or Internal
DEFINITION: The information is either public or for database administration.

NAME: Decimal precision
DEFINITION: This attribute is the number of decimal places.

NAME: Unit
DEFINITION: The unit of measurment for data elements (where appropriate).

NAME: EEA Issue
DEFINITION: An issue form the EEA environmental issues list.

NAME: Version
DEFINITION: This attribute refers to the version number used by the submit organisation in their guidelines/documents.

NAME: Is language used
DEFINITION: Indicates if the resource can have values in different languages

NAME: Source
DEFINITION: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.
